TopicTitle: Good Solar Panels and battery mod?

Articles.Content: As the title states, I am looking for a good solar panel with battery mod. I\'ve tried a couple but haven\'t found one i like. Any suggestions?

I don\'t think there are any mods for batteries but here are a two good packs for space stations with solar panels.

Kosmos: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=7178.0

Probodobodyne DIY Kit: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=6397.0

I think the problem with batteries right now is that there\'s a known bug with MuMech variable tanks (the part most everybody bases their batteries on) involving power levels being reset to zero (which kills the part) on reload. There\'s a new system in .15 that should work a treat for this, but to my knowledge nobody has used it to make a battery yet.

I mean to, but I\'m still working on getting my parts set balanced. Mumble grumble.

Hmmm... darn, I had a ridiculous idea for a rocket to turn into a ship. But it was going to run on batteries and ion drives.
My electric power bat/ion engine ships seem to have no trouble keeping their 'fuel' between loads.

My electric power bat/ion engine ships seem to have no trouble keeping their 'fuel' between loads.

What mod you using?

I been trying to figure out how to download the mod, but the stinking website makes me use orbitdownloader to try and download it. Problem is I uninstalled that poop a while ago. I need to clean out my files lol.
